title: Model tuned for scripted responses about CEO‚Äôs and BOD‚Äôs of large organizations and partners
text:
I suspect the GPT LLM has been tuned or re-tuned. This is especially apparent when asking questions about large companies and their CEOs that could potentially have a interest in the company, or partners. 

 I see more frequently the questions limits the total responses(token limit) more and more, and becoming almost scripted. For example, there is a company that has investments in open AI. I asked the question to the app about a large company and it‚Äôs CEO, and it just so happened to leave certain answers out regarding public regulatory matters. Another instance of a similar question i asked about a large company and the app replied ‚Äúthat it forgot to break that down‚Äù. How does AI forget to include something? Not a fan of the recent re-tuning. Still an excellent, revolutionary tool overall. Just wanted to point it out, and the potential bias, and how this goes against ‚Äúresponsible AI‚Äù, if tuning the model to be bias for the rich 1%.

Do what‚Äôs right.  Now is the time!

title: Business Planning
text:
My business plan is complete, and I have a company that will final review my draft. I love how I can put in a concept (farming), and out comes beautiful notes that helps me polish my writing. I also like how it‚Äôs also a nice distraction with story writing. I have a creative and forward thinking mind and I like to have fun; I like to put random  situations in to see what comes out‚Ä¶it‚Äôs nice, real & amusing. 

I mentioned that my business plan is complete because, for those (maybe students), I encourage you to write your paper, gather and site your sources, THEN use ChatGPT to help you select the best adjectives to polish and round off off your thoughts :)
